message.content: This question requires basic knowledge about the physical properties of drumsticks and how they behave when struck together. When a person hits two drumsticks together, the force creates vibrations and causes the insides of the drumsticks to quake. Option (A) is incorrect because drumsticks do not have the ability to light up. Option (B) is incorrect because unless the drumsticks are very brittle, they are unlikely to fall apart from being struck together. Option (D) is incorrect because drumsticks are not flammable and would not burn from being struck together.
